Name: Club Chair
Description:
With a solid wood frame, this chair features luxe details and a contemporary style. Refined and comfortable, Club features buttoned upholstery on both the seat and back, along with refined metal inserts adorning the base of the front legs. The model also comes in an armchair, stool and lounger chair version. All items in this range can be customized with numerous fabric, leather and imitation leather options to choose from.

Made in Italy

S       side chair         9192S
A       arm chair         9192A
B       barstool           9192B
L        lounge             9192L

*Custom made to order*

Description:
With a solid wood frame, this lounger chair features luxe details and a contemporary style. Refined and comfortable, Club features buttoned upholstery on both the seat and back, along with refined metal inserts adorning the base of the front legs. Name: Icon Dining Table
Description:
Icon is a statement piece with a distinctive base of elegantly intertwined gleaming steel ellipses at different angles in a sensual gilt bronze colour which accentuates the reflected light. The sophisticated elegance of this stunningly sculpted table of extreme lightness and intriguing transparency captures the attention. The slender top with gently rounded corners is available in marble, wood or glass. Icon is available in 2 standard sizes, 240×120 cm for marble and 250×128 cm for wood.

Made in Italy

Wooden top 
Dimensions:  250 – 98 1/2L        128 – 50 1/2W         76 – 30H

Glass top
Dimensions: 240 – 94 1/2L        110 – 43 1/2W         1,5 – 5/8H

*Custom made to order*
